data.title: App intro. Four steps, you can skip them or swipe one by one.
data.descriptions:
BeReal is the first Uncontrollable social media to share an authentic moments in Photo.
Everyday at a random time, everyone has to capture a Photo in 2 minutes.
Capture and post in time to discover what your Friends are up to. 

CAMERA üì∏ 
‚Ä¢ The camera is quite unusual, it's actually taking a picture of what is in front of you and a selfie at the same time. 

COMMENTS üí¨ 
‚Ä¢ Comment your friend's BeReal and chat with all his friends. 

REALMOJIS üò± 
‚Ä¢ React on your friend's BeReal with a RealMoji. 

MAP üó∫ 
‚Ä¢ See where all your friends are when they take their BeReal. 

DISCOVER üîç 
‚Ä¢ Photos of people around the world in the public timeline. 

‚úî It's life, Real life, and this life is without filters. #nofilter #beauthentic 
‚úî It's your chance to show your friends who you really are, for once. 
‚úî It's pronounced ‚ÄúBiRil‚Äù, not bereale, or B√®reol, it‚Äôs like B-Real from Cypress Hill. 
‚úî BeReal is written well BeReal all attached, not be real detached.

data.title: Registration steps, name, birthday, phone number and username.
Step where you can find your friends by scanning them.
‚ö†Ô∏è Time to BeReal. ‚ö†Ô∏è : is the title of the notification where you can start your first BeReal.
Ready to BeReal? Create your first BeReal and add a caption!
Your main profile is a preview of your BeReal shots and editting space.
In My Friends section you could add more friends from your contacts list.
Discovery section, is place where you will find overal guys's BeReal shots.
Now it's time to RealMojis and react to your friends's BeReals
Also from Discovery section, you can add a new friends from there profiles.
